New_Rochelle.Manor Club: Manor Club is a historic clubhouse located at Pelham Manor, Westchester County, New York. It was built in 1921-1922, and is a Tudor Revival style "L"-shaped building consisting of a one-story sunroom, two-story main clubhouse, and three-story theater. The stuccoed building features half-timbering, bracketed timber entrances, and a large hipped roof.
